title: IPartingSurfaceFeatureData.ReleaseSelectionAccess
description: Releases access to the selections that define this parting surface feature.
remarks:
IPartingSurfaceFeatureData::AccessSelections
puts the model in a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define the parting surface feature.
Use this method to restore the rollback state if you did not modify the feature, or use
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
or
IFeature::IModifyDefinition2
if you did modify the feature.
